Docs.summary:
Checks that the Azure Cosmos DB account name already exists. A valid account name may contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and the '-' character, and must be between 3 and 50 characters.
Request Path/providers/Microsoft.DocumentDB/databaseAccountNames/{accountName}
Operation IdDatabaseAccounts_CheckNameExists
Default Api Version2024-02-15-preview
Resource
Docs.exception: is an empty string, and was expected to be non-empty.
